ygData.subject: Re: Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You have missed the fact that not everyone participates in contests, or lotteries, or dueling.  So SOME people s fun would be lessened, but not everyone s.
ygData.messageBody:
>>Then people couldn't win cool stuff in contests, win the lottery and buy
>>a neat high level weapon, duel a higher level character and grab some
>>cool booty. THAT would make the game no fun because isn't that what we
>>are about? To have fun? Or have I missed something?

You have missed the fact that not everyone participates in contests, or
lotteries, or dueling. So SOME people's fun would be lessened, but not
everyone's. And booty could still be sold, just not used until it was time.
This idea has worked fine in MUDs and no one complained about a loss of fun.
